purpose: To emphasize the importance of focusing on long-term sustainable Total Shareholder Return (TSR) over short-term earnings.
title: Importance of Long-term TSR

bullets.text: is to deliver above average long-term TSR; it is not about focusing on short term EPS & quarterly earnings

bullets.highlight: Is compatible with long term sustainability
Serves a broad set of stakeholders including shareholders

supporting_facts: Managing for SV gets management teams thinking of the company's owners
Most investors are professional and long term oriented fund managers, not short term speculators
Benefits to stakeholders when the size of economic pie increases
reasoning_strategy: Comparative analysis between long-term and short-term focus.

text_rules.emphasis_rule: Use of bold for main goals
